00026 /// \ingroup (enums)
00027 /// \brief
00028 /// The FdoConditionType enumeration defines the filter condition types available. 
00029 /// This enumeration is used in the capabilities.
00030 enum FdoConditionType
00031 {
00032     /// Tests if one expression is equal, not equal, greater than, less than, 
00033     /// greater than or equal to, or less than or equal to another expression.
00034     FdoConditionType_Comparison,
00035 
00036     /// Tests if the value of a specified data property matches a specified pattern.
00037     FdoConditionType_Like,
00038 
00039     /// Tests if the value of a specified data property is within a given set 
00040     /// of literal values.
00041     FdoConditionType_In,
00042 
00043     /// Tests if the value of a specified data property is null.
00044     FdoConditionType_Null,
00045 
00046     /// Tests whether the value of a geometric property and a literal geometric 
00047     /// value satisfy the spatial relationship implied by the operation.
00048     FdoConditionType_Spatial,
00049 
00050     /// Tests whether the value of a geometric property is within or beyond a 
00051     /// specified distance of a literal geometric value.
00052     FdoConditionType_Distance
00053 };
00054 #endif
00055
